mapper.select: SELECT pcm.PCMAPNG_ID ,p.PRTNR_ID ,p.PRTNR_NM ,pcm.CMPNY_ID ,IF(pcm.PCMAPNG_ID IS NULL, 'N', pcm.USE_AT) AS USE_AT FROM STN_PRTNR p LEFT JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG pcm ON pcm.PRTNR_ID = p.PRTNR_ID AND pcm.CMPNY_ID = #{cmpnyId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE PCMAPNG_ID = #{pcmapngId}
